mapper.insert: insert into member (id, name, password, addr, agentF, agentA) values (#{id}, #{name}, #{password}, #{addr}, #{agentF}, #{agentA})
mapper.select: select * from member where (id=#{id} and password=#{password}) or (id=#{id} and temporary=#{password})
mapper.update: update member set (finalInDtm, failInCnt)=(CURRENT_DATE, 0) where (id=#{id} and password=#{password}) or (id=#{id} and temporary=#{password})
mapper.insert: insert into rec select m.cd_item, #{id}, 0 from ms_agentitem m
mapper.select: select * from ms_agent where addr_zip like '서울%'

select distinct(m1.cd_item),m1.cd_agent, m1.nm_item, m1.remark, m1.amt_amount, m1.src, (case when sqrt(SUM(r1.isSold))*sqrt(SUM(r2.isSold))=0 then 0 else SUM(r1.isSold * r2.isSold)/(sqrt(SUM(r1.isSold))*sqrt(SUM(r2.isSold))) end) as result from ms_agentitem m1, (select cd_item, sum(qty_delivtot) selTot from sl_saleitem where cd_customer=#{memberid} group by cd_item order by selTot desc limit 3) m2 , rec r1 inner join rec r2 on r1.member=r2.member where m1.cd_item=r1.cd_item and m2.cd_item=r2.cd_item and m1.cd_item != m2.cd_item and (m1.cd_agent=#{agentF} or m1.cd_agent=#{agentA}) group by m1.cd_item, m1.nm_item, m1.remark, m1.amt_amount, m1.src, m1.cd_agent order by result DESC limit 6;

select distinct(m.cd_item),m.cd_agent, m.nm_item, m.remark, m.amt_amount, m.src from ms_agentitem m, ( select s.cd_item, (select lvl_item from ms_agentitem where cd_item=s.cd_item), sum(s.qty_delivtot) selTot from sl_saleitem s where s.cd_customer=#{memberid} group by s.cd_item order by selTot desc limit 3 ) T where m.lvl_item=T.lvl_item and m.cd_item != T.cd_item and (m.cd_agent=#{agentF} or m.cd_agent=#{agentA})
select max(cd_agent) cd_agent, cd_item, nm_item, amt_amount, remark from ms_agentitem where cd_item=#{item} group by cd_item, nm_item, amt_amount, remark
mapper.insert: insert into sl_sale (no_saleslip, amt_amount, cd_agent, cd_customer, dt_sale, gbn_slip) values (#{noSaleslip}, #{amount}, #{agent}, #{memberid}, CURRENT_DATE, 'NN');

insert into sl_saleitem (no_saleslip, amt_amount, amt_price, cd_agent, cd_item, dt_sale, qty_delivtot, seq, cd_customer) values (#{noSaleslip}, #{amount},#{price},#{agent}, #{item},CURRENT_DATE, #{qty}, #{seq}, #{memberid});
mapper.select: select t.* from (SELECT s.dt_sale::date+2 dt_deliv, (select gbn_agent from ms_agent where cd_agent=s.cd_agent) gbn_agent, cd_agent, (select nm_item from ms_agentitem where cd_item=s.cd_item) nm_item, amt_amount FROM sl_saleitem s WHERE cd_customer='123' ORDER BY s.no_saleslip desc) t where (t.dt_deliv - current_date) < 3 and (t.dt_deliv - current_date)>= 0
mapper.insert: insert into basket (memberid, nm_item, amt_amount, amt_price, cd_agent, cd_item, qty_delivtot) values (#{memberid}, #{name}, #{amount},#{price},#{agent}, #{item}, #{qty});
